Definition.WordDefinition: enlightened adj 1: highly educated; having extensive information or understanding; "an enlightened public"; "knowing instructors"; "a knowledgeable critic"; "a knowledgeable audience" [syn: {knowing}, {knowledgeable}, {learned}, {lettered}, {well-educated}, {well-read}] 2: having knowledge and spiritual insight; [ant: {unenlightened}] 3: freed from illusion [syn: {disillusioned}] 4: having or based on relevant experience; "an educated guess"; "an enlightened electorate" [syn: {educated}] n : people who have been introduced to the mysteries of some field or activity; "it is very familiar to the initiate" [syn: {initiate}] [ant: {uninitiate}]
